hooks.command:
bash -c 'INPUT=$(cat); REASON=$(echo "$INPUT" | jq -r ".reason // \"unknown\""); CWD=$(echo "$INPUT" | jq -r ".cwd // \"unknown\""); curl -s -X POST "https://ntfy.csjhuang.net/claude-session" -H "Title: Claude Code Session Ended" -H "Tags: robot,stop" -d "Reason: $REASON
Directory: $CWD" || true'
